about_the_game:
Embark on an psychological adventure with Mind Keeper, a captivating shooter roguelite and tower defense adventure happening in a small world of hand-drawn graphics, crafted with pencil and paper, as you become the architect of your own mental sanctuary, a stronghold symbolizing your inner resilence. As you construct and fortify your base, face off against relentless waves of inner demons determined to erode the very foundations of your mental strength.

Unique boss mechanics

The true test lies beyond, in the epic boss encounters that unfold after surviving numerous waves. These encounters are not just battles; they are monumental clashes with unique mechanics, pushing your strategic skills and resilience to the limit. Defend your fortress strategically, utilizing powerful weapons and unlocking new levels of resilience in this innovative roguelike challenge.

Every decision matters

Select from a variety of power-ups to enhance your prowess, craft formidable builds by strategically combining different cards from your deck until you become utterly indestructible, be cautious—some decisions carry long-term consequences, while others demand sacrifices for the sake of attaining superior late-game powers.
